import React ,{ useState } from 'react' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import ModalForm from '../../component/Modals/Modals'; import Formgroup from '../../component/Forms/Forms'; const FreezeAccount = () => { return ( <>
Oops!! Your PFW Account is Freeze

According to our records, your account has been frozen. This means that you haven't completed some essential steps required by our security protocols.

First, activate your account. Click on [link or button name] and follow the provided instructions.

But don't worry! You can reactivate your account and get ready to purchase a subscription. Here are some simple steps you'll need to follow: Activate Your Account: First, activate your account. Click on [link or button name] and follow the provided instructions. Security Verification: In some cases, we feel the need for additional security verification. Therefore, please follow the provided instructions to verify your identity. Purchase Your Subscription: Once your account is activated, you can easily purchase your desired subscription. Click on [subscription options or link name] and select your subscription. If you need any assistance, feel free to contact our customer support team. We're here to help you.
) } export default FreezeAccount
